text: 9Rdh 754 TTHRf qiferarot (73w5 4dev & RNJTANf FAT4, HRT TTFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) TrHa T #-5 W 6, Tqz7-10, RqT, 78f folt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 3 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Administration/2024 Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.31 dated 31st January, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/ Misc Agenda/2024-Admin.IIIA (Comp. No. 236154)} Sub: Provision for Service Bond in case of Direct Recruitment made by NHAI In continuation to the Policy Circular No.1.3.1.30 dated 16.01.2024 on the above mentioned subject (copy enclosed- Annexure-I) , the Service-cum-Guarantee Bond enclosed as Annexure-Il is circulated herewith for the information and necessary action of all concerned. 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 31 ol24 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers & Employees of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 _ Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3_ Web Admin for circulation_ 'M 7 7 9 NHAI Reg: Copy
